featured.text: What’s a Friend for (B) Seashells and Mollusks (C) Appropriate Topics for Writing (D) Writing for Different Purposes 42.

definition.zh_def: 海洋生物的外殼，通常由貝類或其他海洋生物所產生。
definition.en_def: The hard protective outer case of marine animals, typically produced by mollusks.
definition.example: The children collected seashells along the beach.
